description:
Perform rapid slashes.
\i[104]:[100%\i[57]][\i[116]](+20% \i[1056])(2 hits) RNG:[Square 1] SCP:[Circle 0]
name: Sword (R)
note:
<letbs>
scope: square(1)
sequence: sunder2
</letbs>
<letbs_AI>
type: offense
</letbs_AI>
<damage formula>
value = a.atk;
$gameVariables.setValue(1, 0);
if (user.isStateAffected(27) && target.attackedFrom()=="back"){
value *= 2;
};
if(user.isStateAffected(31)){
$gameVariables.setValue(1, -1);
};
if(user.isStateAffected(32)){
$gameVariables.setValue(1, -2);
};
if (user.isStateAffected(34)){
  var get = a.getStateCounter(34)||0;
  value += a.atk * 0.2 * get;
  a.setStateCounter(34, 0);
}
</damage formula>
<Before Eval>
a.setTempStat('hit',["Skill 101",0.20]);
</Before Eval>
<After Eval>
a.setTempStat('hit',["Skill 101",0]);
</After Eval>

description:
Perform a far reaching strike.
\i[104]:[75%\i[57]][\i[116]] RNG:[Circle 1] SCP:[Line 1-2]
name: Spear (L)
note:
<letbs>
scope: line(2,1)

sequence: lunge
</letbs>
<letbs_AI>
type: offense

value = a.atk * 0.75;
$gameVariables.setValue(1, 0);
if (user.isStateAffected(27) && target.attackedFrom()=="back"){
value *= 2;
};
if(user.isStateAffected(28) && user.agi > target.agi){
$gameVariables.setValue(1, (user.agi - target.agi) );
};
if(user.isStateAffected(31)){
$gameVariables.setValue(1, -1);
};
if(user.isStateAffected(32)){
$gameVariables.setValue(1, -2);
};
if (user.isStateAffected(34)){
  var get = a.getStateCounter(34)||0;
  value += a.atk * 0.2 * get;
  a.setStateCounter(34, 0);
}
</damage formula>

description:
Perform a smash.
\i[104]:[75%\i[57]][\i[116]](2x damage on \it[29]) \i[106]:[3[\i[116]] RNG:[Circle 1] SCP:[Circle 0]
name: Mace (S)
note:
<letbs>
scope: circle(1)
</letbs>
<letbs_AI>
type: offense
</letbs_AI>
<damage formula>
b.gainTp(-3);
b.getEntity().addTextIconPopup("-3",0,56);
value = a.atk * 0.75;
$gameVariables.setValue(1, 0);
var armors = [29];
for (var i = 0; i < armors.length; i++){
  if(b.isStateAffected(armors[i]) && b.getStateCounter(armors[i]) > 0){
    value *= 2; break;
  }
}
if (user.isStateAffected(27) && target.attackedFrom()=="back"){
value *= 2;
};
if(user.isStateAffected(31)){
$gameVariables.setValue(1, -1);
};
if(user.isStateAffected(32)){
$gameVariables.setValue(1, -2);
};
if (user.isStateAffected(34)){
  var get = a.getStateCounter(34)||0;
  value += a.atk * 0.2 * get;
  a.setStateCounter(34, 0);
}
</damage formula>
